name: KungKong
description:
Kung Kong is a intense pick-up & play arcade game that gets inspiration from air hockey and pong.. Play PvE or go head-to-head against another person in PvP.

A party game that was equal amounts of fun playing the game as it is to watch someone else play it. This is why we figured to choose a new way to play our game taking inspiration from Pong and other arcade games such as air hockey we created Kung Kong, a game that's all about speed and adrenaline.

KungKong is meant to be a party game played on 2 screens lying down but can now also be played on 1 screen, these 2 options are picked from the main screen of the game.

Created by:

Daniel Grönkvist - Designer & Programmer

Jesper Bentzer - Designer

Lilly Wang - Art

Elias Erkendal - Programmer

Filip Primaru - Music & Audio

Christian Lindström - Music

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

---Keyboard controls---

1 Screen (Standing)

Player 1

  • Enter to join.
  • Right Shift to smash.
  • Arrow keys up and down to move up and down.

Player 2 

  • Space bar to join and smash.
  • W and S to move up and down.

2 Screens (Laying Down)

Player 1

  • Enter to join.
  • Right Shift to smash.
  • Arrow keys up and down to move up and down.

Player 2 

  • Space bar to join and smash.
  • W and S to move up and down.

Controller controls (Xbox 360)

1 Screen (Standing)

  • Start to join and leave
  • A to smash
  • Left Stick to move up and down

2 Screens (Laying Down)

  • Start to join and leave
  • A to smash
  • Left and right bumper to move up and down
